---
title: 快速上手 | Teal-design-ui
description: 快速上手
---

# 快速上手

## 安装方式

```js
npm install --save-dev teal-design-ui
```

## 全局引入

main.ts

```ts
import "teal-design-ui/es/packages/index.css";
// 引入全局方法
import TealDesignUi from "@yike-design/ui";

const app = createApp(App);
app.use(TealDesignUi);
```
